definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: She was one of the chief leaders of the World Anti-fascist Committee.
sentences.chinese: 她是世界反法西斯委員會的主要領導人之一。

sentences.english: It may be fascism, or barbarism.
sentences.chinese: 那可能是法西斯主義，或暴力主義。

sentences.english: China is the main power and the main Warfield.
sentences.chinese: 中國是抗擊法西斯日本的主要力量和主要戰場。

sentences.english: He joined the underground to fight against the fascists.
sentences.chinese: 他參加了地下組織與法西斯作戰。

sentences.english: The fascists massacred those women and children in cold blood.
sentences.chinese: 法西斯分子慘無人道地屠殺了那些婦女兒童。

sentences.english: What they really want is a one-party fascist dictatorship.
sentences.chinese: 他們實際上要的是法西斯主義的一黨專政。

sentences.english: This suffers a defeat and flees the basic function to the Japanese Fascist.
sentences.chinese: 這對日本法西斯的敗亡起着根本作用。

sentences.english: Logically only the anti-fascists must have stayed in the German Democratic Republic.
sentences.chinese: 而只有反對法西斯的人還留在德國民主共和國。

sentences.english: They also thought that only the Soviet Union would be powerful enough to defeat Fascism.
sentences.chinese: 他們還認爲蘇聯是能夠戰勝法西斯主義的唯一力量。

sentences.english: When fascism comes to America, it will come wrapped in an America flag.
sentences.chinese: ‘法西斯主義登陸美國時，總會包着一面美國旗。’

sentences.english: The Chinese people received support from the people and the anti-fascist forces all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 中國人民得到了全世界人民和反法西斯力量的支持。

sentences.english: The Chinese Anti-Japanese war began the earliest and lasted the longest, and was the determinant in defeating Japanese Fascists.
sentences.chinese: 中國抗日戰爭是世界反法西斯戰爭的東方主戰場。

sentences.english: He was caught up in the anti-fascist movement during the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 在第二次世界大戰期間他投身於反法西斯運動中。

sentences.english: It urged the authorities to stop the fascist oppressive rule.
sentences.chinese: 該聲明督促現當局停止法西斯的壓迫統治。

sentences.english: This is a fight against fascism.
sentences.chinese: 一場與法西斯的殊死對決。

sentences.english: If Plato is a fascist, ? what does that make you?
sentences.chinese: 如果柏拉圖是一名法西斯份子，那你們又該如何自稱？

definition: Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943

pinyin: guo2 jia1 she4 hui4 zhu3 yi4
Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
